summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1761 m), light levels (up 5631 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 176.7m lower than yesterday, 662.0m lower than the past week, 1761.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 890.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1552.3m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and little or no wind. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
